title: SSA
description: Segmented Sequence Analysis calculates two piecewise linear models, aligns them and then computes the similarity between them. Finally a treshhold based approach is used to classify data as anomalous.

parameters.name: rf_method
parameters.description: `all`: Directly calculate reference timeseries from all points. `alpha`: Create weighted reference timeseries with help of parameter 'a'

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: Describes weights that are used for reference time series creation. Can be a single weight(float) or an array of weights. So far only supporting a single value
